    • Field Detail

      • PORTRAIT_IMAGE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String PORTRAIT_IMAGE_NAME
        Name of the image sent to MetadataListener that contains portrait image. This image will be sent to MetadataListener during recognition process if displaying of face image is enabled (see setDisplayPortraitImage(boolean), and receiving of ImageType.DEWARPED image is enabled with MetadataSettings.ImageMetadataSettings.setDewarpedImageEnabled(boolean)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FULL_DOCUMENT_IMAGE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String FULL_DOCUMENT_IMAGE_NAME
        Name of the image sent to MetadataListener that contains full document. This image will be sent to MetadataListener during recognition process if displaying of full document image is enabled (see setDisplayFullDocumentImage(boolean), and receiving of ImageType.DEWARPED image is enabled with MetadataSettings.ImageMetadataSettings.setDewarpedImageEnabled(boolean)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CREATOR

        public static final android.os.Parcelable.Creator<SingaporeIDRecognizerSettings> CREATOR

      • setDisplayPortraitImage

        public void setDisplayPortraitImage(boolean displayPortraitImage)
        Sets whether portrait image from ID card should be sent to MetadataListener. If enabled, image will be of type ImageType.DEWARPED, so make sure you subscribe to receiving of ImageType.DEWARPED images with MetadataSettings.ImageMetadataSettings.setDewarpedImageEnabled(boolean)
        Parameters:
        displayPortraitImage - whether face image should be sent to MetadataListener.

      • shouldDisplayPortraitImage

        public boolean shouldDisplayPortraitImage()
        Returns whether sending of portrait image from ID card to MetadataListener is enabled.
        Returns:
        whether sending of portrait image from ID card to MetadataListener is enabled.

      • setDisplayFullDocumentImage

        public void setDisplayFullDocumentImage(boolean displayFullDocumentImage)
        Sets whether full document image should be sent to MetadataListener. If enabled, image will be of type ImageType.DEWARPED, so make sure you subscribe to receiving of ImageType.DEWARPED images with MetadataSettings.ImageMetadataSettings.setDewarpedImageEnabled(boolean)
        Parameters:
        displayFullDocumentImage - whether full document image should be sent to MetadataListener.

      • shouldDisplayFullDocumentImage

        public boolean shouldDisplayFullDocumentImage()
        Returns whether sending of full document image to MetadataListener is enabled.
        Returns:
        whether sending of full document image to MetadataListener is enabled.
